title: Hope: A Credit Union on a Mission in the Mississippi Delta
text: Hope: A Credit Union on a Mission in the Mississippi Delta Hope is rebuilding trust in banking industry and helping people with economic mobility By Clara Ritger and Emily B. Hager April 26, 2018 2:48 pm Hope Credit Union, based in Jackson, Miss., is one of the only banks serving the Delta region, where communities have a historic distrust of the financial industry and many banks have shuttered branches. Hope is one of three finalists in The Wall Street Journal's 2018 Financial Inclusion Challenge. Financial Inclusion in America Nearly one-fourth of U.S. adults can't pay their monthly bills, and have little or no access to a bank. Many more have no retirement savings. This video series highlights Americans' economic struggles and efforts to provide them with greater financial security.
